About Me

My journey into User Experience

BIO

I enjoyed creating beautiful setups and displays but understanding the users, discovering and solving problems was something I was always very passionate about. Therefore, leading me to recently complete a 400+ hour UX Design course through CareerFoundry. I embrace all design problems with open-mind and thrive to find the best solutions by asking right questions and putting users first.
